description: This file defines a data model for movie scripts using Pydantic, and sets up an agent to generate movie scripts based on a prompt, utilizing Azure AI Foundry.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script, including setting, ending, genre, name, characters, and storyline.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Method to print the response generated by the agent based on a prompt.
